entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who had let it slip that they were searching for Flamel's name. He was looking disgruntled and hurried off to the library.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who said 'Just have to find out for ourselv e s ,  t h e n' and left Hagrid looking disgruntled. He went to the library with Hagrid.

entities.name: flamel
entities.description: Flamel is a person whose name they were searching for in books. It was hard to know where to begin because they didn't know what Flamel might have done to get himself into a book.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who was trying to steal something that they needed to find out about. They were searching for Flamel's name because of Snape.

relationships.description: Ron and Hagrid went to the library together.
Ron was searching for Flamel's name in books with Hagrid.
